mapper.select: SELECT orc.order_receipt_id AS orderReceiptId, u.user_name AS customerName, orc.orderdate AS orderDate, s.product_name AS productName, od.order_quantity AS quantity, s.price * od.order_quantity AS totalAmount, orc.order_status AS orderStatus FROM order_receipt orc JOIN user u ON orc.user_id = u.user_id JOIN order_detail od ON orc.order_receipt_id = od.order_receipt_id JOIN snapshot s ON od.snapshot_id = s.snapshot_id ORDER BY orc.order_receipt_id DESC
